sentences.english: Perhaps he earned the money through ill means.
sentences.chinese: 或許他的錢是通過卑劣的手段掙來的。

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按時分沒有平靜，也能夠或許選擇圍攻或水力壓抑。

sentences.english: Or maybe it is because trees, in the scheme of development, provide an easy compromise.
sentences.chinese: 又或許是在發展的進程表中，樹讓人更容易讓步。

sentences.english: Since I left I have probably changed my view.
sentences.chinese: 當我離開曼聯後，我的看法或許已經改變了。

sentences.english: You may wonder how many of his peers would agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 你或許會好奇他的同行中有幾個人贊同他的觀點。

sentences.english: Perhaps we all knew - or, at least, imagined - that it would be this way.
sentences.chinese: 或許我們都知道，或者至少可以想象他可能是這樣的。

sentences.english: Maybe I'm going to Mount Emei next vacation. but I'm not sure.
sentences.chinese: 或許我可以在下個假期去峨眉山，但我不會去。

sentences.english: You should send a message to your family, maybe they are looking forward to it!
sentences.chinese: 給您的家人報一聲平安，或許他們正在翹首企盼。

sentences.english: This was probably the first time the Britons came into contact with other peoples.
sentences.chinese: 這或許是不列顛人第一次同外族人進行交往。

sentences.english: Tao Okamoto’s 'rice bowl' hair may be the most valuable cut in the world.
sentences.chinese: 岡本多緒的碗狀頭或許是世界上最昂貴的髮型了。

sentences.english: He’s perhaps the most well-known painter from all of the 20:th century.
sentences.chinese: 他或許是近一個世紀以來最負盛名的藝術家。

sentences.english: Maybe, Della was alone. She used to lock herself in her own room.
sentences.chinese: 或許，黛拉是孤獨的，她總是把自己鎖在房間裏。

sentences.english: But below are the six basic elements you hope to include in your strategy.
sentences.chinese: 但是下面六個基本要素你或許希望包括在你的策略裏。

sentences.english: If you live near Quebec, you will probably be able to pick up some French stations.
sentences.chinese: 如果你住在魁北克附近，你或許會找到一些法語電臺。

sentences.english: Maybe I might have the same effect with them, too.
sentences.chinese: 要是我是它們的話，或許也會這樣。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
